response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,000,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I believe this is the best possible deal we can offer, given the unique nature of the product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
